EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Global_CH_MSP_Webinar_MC.202005_Invitation_Global_CH_MSP_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date – Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en]]>
Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan Webinar! Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Manager, Ron Smith, for our upcoming webinar: Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plan Extended Coverage Offerings.
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will present sales strategies for Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) Offerings to address obsolescence, as well as when to pursue a Retrofit, Maintenance and Upgrade (RMU) sale vs MSP.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in identifying platforms for target markets and global opportunities for the MSP Extended Coverage Offerings.
DATE May 19th, 2020
TIME 8:00am - 9:00am MST
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
HOSTED BY Dan Stockfisch PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_M3XaNtdNRqy972VEHXIuHg]]>
This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/eZ00DX02000IQn000Prq00G]]> to let us know! © 2020 Honeywell International Inc. 300 S Tryon St Suite 500, Charlotte, NC 28202 This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
